mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWLIKES (profileno, chklikes, review_No) SELECT #{profileno}, 1, #{reviewNo} FROM DUAL A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM REVIEWLIKES WHERE profileno=#{profileno} AND chklikes=1 AND review_No=#{reviewNo});
mapper.select: SELECT rl.chklikes FROM REVIEWLIKES rl WHERE reviewlikes_No=#{reviewlikesNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEWLIKES SET chklikes=chklikes-1 WHERE reviewlikes_No=#{reviewlikesNo}
